resources.string:
CU Print is an app that lets you print to Printers at Columbia University.

 It uses the PrintAtCU service (http://www.printatcu.com) so you will find your document under the host "printatcu.com", a random username and the given file name.

 Print jobs usually take 30 seconds after being sent to appear on the printer queue.

 Data Collection Policy is per PrintAtCU's Privacy Policy.
